page.title: 07POLEGATE CLUBS & ACTIVITIES
page.content:
TWICE A WEEK I GO TO THE COMMUNITY CENTRE TO PRACTICE A PLAY WITH THE JUNIOR DRAMA GROUP.IN APRIL WE PERFORMED A PLAY "THE WHOLE TRUTH" ON THE COMMUNITY CENTRE STAGE. IN THIS I PLAYED"PINKY", A STUTTERING SCHOOLBOY. I WORE MY SCHOOL CLOTHES AND HAD SOME MAKE-UP ON. IT WAS CERTAINLY GOOD FUN.
AT POLEGATE SCOUTS WE DO ALL KINDS OF THINGS. LAST WEEK WE WENT TO CAMP AT BUSHY WOOD WHERE WE STAYED IN TENTS. WE HAD TO COOK OUR OWN FOOD AND WE HAD TO GO TO AND FRO FROM THE FOREST FOR WATER. WE HAD A GREAT SWAMP FIGHT WHERE YOU THROW SLIMY MUD AT EACH OTHER. I HAVE PASSED MY AXE AND KNIFE TEST THAT ENABLES ME TO USE AN AXE AND KNIFE.AT THE MOMENT I AM WORKING FOR A BADGE CALLED THE SCOUTS' AWARD FOR WHICH I HAVE TO PASS LOTS OF DIFFERENT TESTS.
